question: Who among the following runner of India has been suspended by NADA after failing in the dope test?
explanation: 400-meter runner Prachi Choudhary from the state of Uttar Pradesh has been suspended by NADA (National Anti Doping Agency) after failing in dope test. She was excluded from the squad of the 2018 Jakarta Asian Games and she also filed a case in the Supreme Court against the selection procedure of the Athletics Federation of India.
